column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////The ambiance of the restaurant was nice. I liked that they had out door seating . The drinks were great. I had the boss lady. My friends had the good life and one other that I don't remember. The appetizers were great but my main course which was the steak night was way too salty. I could hardly eat the Mac and cheese and green beans. The waiter kindly got me another order of greens but other than that
column2: the food was very salty. The waiter was great . Overall service was great but couldn't give full marks cuz of my entree.
